languages.text: Стоило кораблю подойти на достаточно близкое расстояние к планете, как странный друкарский артефакт из лаборатории гемункула активировался! Пытаясь принять входящий сигнал с поверхности планеты, черные грани призмы начали излучать пульсирующее лиловое свечение. Авгурная команда сообщает, что источником сигнала служит небольшой маяк, который невозможно изучить с орбиты. Вокруг маяка зафиксировано множество живых организмов.

traits.locale_text: Стоило кораблю подойти на достаточно близкое расстояние к планете, как странный друкарский артефакт из лаборатории гемункула активировался! Пытаясь принять входящий сигнал с поверхности планеты, черные грани призма начали излучать пульсирующее лилово свечение. Авгуры сообщают, что источник сигнала — небольшой маяк, который невозможно распознать с орбиты. Вокруг маяка зафиксировано множество живых организмов.

languages.text: Immediately after the ship approaches close enough to the planet, the strange artefact from the Haemonculus's laboratory activates! Trying to receive the incoming signal from the planet's surface, the black faces of the prism have started to emit a pulsating lilac light. The augur team reports that the source of the signal is a small beacon which cannot be studied from orbit. A group of living organisms is detected around the beacon.
languages.original_text: Стоило кораблю подойти на достаточно близкое расстояние к планете, как странный друкарский артефакт из лаборатории гемункула активировался! Пытаясь принять входящий сигнал с поверхности планеты, черные грани призмы начали излучать пульсирующее лиловое свечение. Авгурная команда сообщает, что источником сигнала служит небольшой маяк, который невозможно изучить с орбиты. Вокруг маяка зафиксировано множество живых организмов.

Trying to receive the incoming signal from the planet's surface, the black faces of the prism have started to emit a pulsating lilac light. The augur team reports that the source of the signal is a small beacon which cannot be studied from orbit. A group of living organisms is detected around the beacon.

Trying to receive the incoming signal from the planet's surface, the black faces of the prism have started to emit a pulsating lilac light. The augur team reports that the source of the signal is a small beacon which cannot be studied from orbit. A group of living organisms is detected around the beacon.

Immediately after the ship approaches close enough the planet, the strange artefact from the Haemonculus's laboratory activates! Trying to receive the incoming signal from the planet's surface, the black faces of the prism have started to emit a pulsating lilac light. The augur team reports that the source of the signal is a small beacon which cannot be studied from orbit. A group of living organisms is detected around the beacon.

languages.text: 飞船靠近这颗行星之后，来自血伶人实验室的奇异造物立刻被激活了！黑色的棱镜表面发出了不断脉动的淡紫色光芒。扫描甲板报告说，激活这件造物的信号源于某个小型信标，无法从轨道上进行研究，但他们在该信标周围发现了一群活体生物。
languages.original_text: Immediately after the ship approaches close enough to the planet, the strange artefact from the Haemonculus's laboratory activates! Trying to receive the incoming signal from the planet's surface, the black faces of the prism have started to emit a pulsating lilac light. The augur team reports that the source of the signal is a small beacon which cannot be studied from orbit. A group of living organisms is detected around the beacon.

traits.locale_text: 飞船靠近这颗行星之后，来自血伶人实验室的奇异造物立刻被激活了！黑色的棱镜表面发出了不断脉动的淡紫色光芒。扫描甲板报告说，激活这件造物的信号源于某个小型信标，无法从轨道上进行研究，但他们在该信标周围发现了一群活体生物。

languages.text: 船が惑星に近づいた直後、ハモンキュラスの研究所にあった奇妙なアーチファクトが起動する！惑星の地表からの信号を受信しようとして、プリズムの黒い面が脈打つ薄紫色の光を放ち始めた。スキャナーチームによると、信号の発信源は軌道上からは調査することのできない小さなビーコンだ。 ビーコンの周囲に生物群が検出されている。
languages.original_text: Immediately after the ship approaches close enough to the planet, the strange artefact from the Haemonculus's laboratory activates! Trying to receive the incoming signal from the planet's surface, the black faces of the prism have started to emit a pulsating lilac light. The augur team reports that the source of the signal is a small beacon which cannot be studied from orbit. A group of living organisms is detected around the beacon.

traits.locale_text: 船が惑星に近づいた直後、ハモンキュラスの研究所にあった奇妙なアーチファクトが起動する！惑星の地表からの信号を受信しようとして、プリズムの黒い面が脈打つ薄紫色の光を放ち始めた。スキャナーチームによると、信号の発信源は軌道上からは調査することのできない小さなビーコンだ。 ビーコンの周囲に生物群が検出されている。

languages.text: Inmediatamente después de que la nave se acercara lo suficiente al planeta, el extraño artefacto del laboratorio del Hemónculo se activó. Intentando recibir la señal entrante desde la superficie del planeta, las caras negras del prisma han empezado a emitir una luz lila intermitente. El equipo de augures informa de que la fuente de la señal es una pequeña baliza que no puede estudiarse desde la órbita. Se ha detectado un grupo de organismos vivos alrededor de la baliza.
languages.original_text: Immediately after the ship approaches close enough to the planet, the strange artefact from the Haemonculus's laboratory activates! Trying to receive the incoming signal from the planet's surface, the black faces of the prism have started to emit a pulsating lilac light. The augur team reports that the source of the signal is a small beacon which cannot be studied from orbit. A group of living organisms is detected around the beacon.

traits.locale_text: Inmediatamente después de que la nave se acercara lo suficiente al planeta, el extraño artefacto del laboratorio del Hemónculo se activó. Intentando recibir la señal entrante desde la superficie del planeta, las caras negras del prisma han empezado a emitir una luz lila intermitente. El equipo de augures informa de que la fuente de la señal es una pequeña baliza que no puede estudiarse desde la órbita. Se ha detectado un grupo de organismos vivos alrededor de la baliza.

languages.text: Als sich das Schiff dem Planeten weit genug genähert hat, wird sofort das merkwürdige Artefakt aus dem Labor des Haemonculus aktiviert! Die schwarzen Gesichter des Prismas senden ein pulsierendes violettes Licht aus — sie versuchen, das Signal zu empfangen, das von der Oberfläche des Planeten gesendet wird. Das Auguren-Team berichtet, dass die Quelle des Signals ein kleiner Sender ist, der nicht vom Orbit aus studiert werden kann. Eine Gruppe lebender Organismen wird rund um den Sender registriert.
languages.original_text: Immediately after the ship approaches close enough to the planet, the strange artefact from the Haemonculus's laboratory activates! Trying to receive the incoming signal from the planet's surface, the black faces of the prism have started to emit a pulsating lilac light. The augur team reports that the source of the signal is a small beacon which cannot be studied from orbit. A group of living organisms is detected around the beacon.

traits.locale_text: Als sich das Schiff dem Planeten weit genug genähert hat, wird sofort das merkwürdige Artefakt aus dem Labor des Haemonculus aktiviert! Die schwarzen Gesichter des Prismas senden ein pulsierendes violettes Licht aus — sie versuchen, das Signal zu empfangen, das von der Oberfläche des Planeten gesendet wird. Das Auguren-Team berichtet, dass die Quelle des Signals ein kleiner Sender ist, der nicht vom Orbit aus studiert werden kann. Eine Gruppe lebender Organismen wird rund um den Sender registriert.

languages.text: Dès que le vaisseau s'approche suffisamment de la planète, l'étrange artefact récupéré dans le laboratoire de l'hémoncule s'active ! Cherchant à capter les signaux en provenance de la surface, les facettes noires du prisme commencent à émettre une lueur mauve palpitante. L'équipe des augures vous informe que les ondes proviennent d'une balise de petite taille, trop pour être étudiée depuis l'orbite. Un groupe d'organismes vivants est détecté à proximité.
languages.original_text: Immediately after the ship approaches close enough to the planet, the strange artefact from the Haemonculus's laboratory activates! Trying to receive the incoming signal from the planet's surface, the black faces of the prism have started to emit a pulsating lilac light. The augur team reports that the source of the signal is a small beacon which cannot be studied from orbit. A group of living organisms is detected around the beacon.

traits.locale_text: Dès que le vaisseau s'approche suffisamment de la planète, l'étrange artefact récupéré dans le laboratoire de l'hémoncule s'active ! Cherchant à capter les signaux en provenance de la surface, les facettes noires du prisme commencent à émettre une lueur mauve palpitante. L'équipe des augures vous informe que les ondes proviennent d'une balise de petite taille, trop pour être étudiée depuis l'orbite. Un groupe d'organismes vivants est détecté à proximité.

languages.text: Gemi gezegene yeterince yaklaştığı anda Haimonkulus'un laboratuvarından alınan tuhaf eser, harekete geçiyor! Gezegenin yüzeyinden gelen sinyalleri almaya çalışan prizmanın kara yüzleri; titreşen, mor bir parıltı yaymaya başlıyor. Alamet ekibi, sinyalin kaynağının yörüngeden incelenemeyecek kadar küçük bir parıldak olduğunu bildiriyor. Parıldağın yakınlarında bir grup canlı organizmanın varlığı da tespit ediliyor.
languages.original_text: Immediately after the ship approaches close enough to the planet, the strange artefact from the Haemonculus's laboratory activates! Trying to receive the incoming signal from the planet's surface, the black faces of the prism have started to emit a pulsating lilac light. The augur team reports that the source of the signal is a small beacon which cannot be studied from orbit. A group of living organisms is detected around the beacon.
